attributes.action: I want to put professor Chris Whitty forward for a knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: As it always seems to be the least deserving people that get a knighthood that is normally bought rather than earned, this man has dedicated his life to science and medicine and deserves the credit as does his team.
attributes.background: I want the government to get Boris Johnson to put forward professor Chris Whitty for a knighthood as he deserves it after all the hard work he has done for the people of the Uk.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
